extensionDescription.message: Firefox 二步验证器扩展，可自动填充二步验证码并支持 Firefox Android

confirm.description: Confirm button text before account deleted

none.description: Displayed when no Container is assigned

submit.description: Submit form content as a new account

reset.description: Reset form to its initial status

export.description: Export all data to your disk

sure.description: Sure button text before action taken

cancel.description: Cancel button text before action taken

label_assign_container.description: Current Container which the account assigned onto

label_issuer.description: The site from which generates OTP secret key

label_algorithm.description: Hash algorithm used to manipulate Secret Tokens

label_algorithm_time.description: OTP type that based on time

label_algorithm_counter.description: OTP type that based on counter

about_acknowledgement_thanks_to_helpers.message: 特别感谢 💖 下列在项目构建当中作出的贡献的第三方：

about_acknowledgement_helper_first.message: Mozilla 的 Photon Design 设计文档 与 相关图标资源

about_acknowledgement_helper_second.message: QRScaner QR 码处理代码与 JSOTP TOTP 生成算法

about_acknowledgement_helper_third.message: Authenticator 与 Yubioath Desktop 当中的特性启发

about_acknowledgement_helper_fourth.message: Firefox Send for encryption code & js-base64 for base64 encoding.

about_acknowledgement_helper_fifth.message: Violentmonkey Dropbox API 操作算法

about_acknowledgement_logo.message: EYHN 图标设计

about_acknowledgement_helper_last.message: 其他帮助项目构建的第三方与智力

about_respected_RFC.message: 本项目当中的 TOTP 验证码处理算法源自 RFC 6238

about_license.message: 除非另行明确声明，否则本项目协议均为 GNU General Public License 3.0

general_checkout_wiki.message: 阅读帮助文档 可以了解更多详情。

general_translation.message: 请帮助我们 进行翻译

general_option_autofill.message: 禁用二步验证码自动填充（之后只能通过右键菜单或工具栏弹出窗口填充）

tokens_warning_message_content.message: 删除账户信息不会禁用账户的二步验证。请确认您不会因此而被拒绝访问您的账户。
